mapper.select: SELECT AVG(t1.score) AS avgScore FROM user AS t0, user_result as t1 left outer join user_result as t2 on t1.ip_address = t2.ip_address AND (t1.create_time < t2.create_time OR (t1.create_time = t2.create_time AND t1.ip_address < t2.ip_address)) where t2.ip_address is NULL AND t0.user_id = t1.user_id AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{value}

SELECT AVG(t1.score) AS avgScore, DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS yearMonth FROM user AS t0, user_result as t1 left outer join user_result as t2 on t1.ip_address = t2.ip_address AND (t1.create_time < t2.create_time OR (t1.create_time = t2.create_time AND t1.ip_address < t2.ip_address)) where t2.ip_address is NULL AND t0.user_id = t1.user_id GROUP BY yearMonth ORDER BY yearMonth DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT AVG(t1.score) AS avgScore, DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m') AS yearMonth FROM user AS t0, user_result as t1 left outer join user_result as t2 on t1.ip_address = t2.ip_address AND (t1.create_time < t2.create_time OR (t1.create_time = t2.create_time AND t1.ip_address < t2.ip_address)) where t2.ip_address is NULL AND t0.user_id = t1.user_id GROUP BY yearMonth ORDER BY yearMonth DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client AS t0, user_result as t1 left outer join user_result as t2 on t1.ip_address = t2.ip_address AND (t1.create_time < t2.create_time OR (t1.create_time = t2.create_time AND t1.ip_address < t2.ip_address)) where t2.ip_address is NULL AND t0.user_id = t1.user_id AND t0.ip_address = t1.ip_address AND t1.score BETWEEN #{startScore} AND #{endScore}
